StringTable.Label: ElectChairmanRes_Name
StringTable.String: Elect A United Planet Chair.

StringTable.Label: ElectChairmanRes_Dec
StringTable.String: In order to better assist all the races of the Galaxy, the U.P. elects a Chair Being that will lead the U.P. for the next four sessions, whose duty it is to choose which proposals should be presented. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](The winning race is appointed the U.P. Chair for the duration)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: ElectChairmanRes_Question
StringTable.String: Who should be the U.P. Chair?

StringTable.Label: UnitedPlanetsHeadquarters_Name
StringTable.String: United Planets Headquarters

StringTable.Label: UnitedPlanetsHeadquarters_Dec
StringTable.String: One member race is chosen to host the United Planets Headquarters for the duration. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](50% bonus to Influence for the selected race)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: UnitedPlanetsHeadquarters_Question
StringTable.String: Who should get the UP HQ?

StringTable.Label: UnitedPlanetsTourismBoard_Name
StringTable.String: United Planets Tourism Board

StringTable.Label: UnitedPlanetsTourismBoard_Dec
StringTable.String: In order to facilitate race relations and better educate its member citizens, the United Planets moves to establish a Galactic Tourism Board. This will help popularize the assorted tourist spots throughout the galaxy. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Tourism bonuses are doubled)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: UnitedPlanetsTourismBoard_Question
StringTable.String: Should we open the United Planets Tourism Board?

StringTable.Label: GalaxyUnitedCelebration_Name
StringTable.String: Galaxy United Celebration

StringTable.Label: GalaxyUnitedCelebration_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets proposes to organize a year long celebration in an attempt to make the citizens of the galaxy realize how good they have it. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](10% Approval bonus to all members)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GalaxyUnitedCelebration_Question
StringTable.String: Should we start the Galaxy United Celebration?

StringTable.Label: EconomicRedistributionAct_Name
StringTable.String: Economic Redistribution

StringTable.Label: EconomicRedistributionAct_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets has grown concerned that some have become excessively wealthy by exploiting the other races of the UP. It therefore proposes a tax on the wealthiest race. The revenue generated will be equally distributed between the remaining members. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](The race with the largest treasury gives 25% of their credits to the remaining members)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: EconomicRedistributionAct_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have an Economic Redistribution?

StringTable.Label: GalacticPeace_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Peace

StringTable.Label: GalacticPeace_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets proposes that all interstellar wars be brought to an immediate end. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Wars are ended and can not be declared for the duration)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GalacticPeace_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have Galactic Peace?

StringTable.Label: InterstellarWarFine_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar War Fine

StringTable.Label: InterstellarWarFine_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets has found that the price of interstellar war has become so great that it affects the economies of all races including those not embroiled in these conflicts. Therefore, it proposes a Tax on all member races that continue to wage war. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Warring races are fined 25% of their treasury, these credits are distributed to non-warring members)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: InterstellarWarFine_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have an Interstellar War Fine?

StringTable.Label: GalacticGamesFund_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Games Fund

StringTable.Label: GalacticGamesFund_Dec
StringTable.String: Taking a note from the Romans the United Planets proposes a galaxy sporting event, the Galactic Games, to bring the disparate races together to compete in just about every sport known, over a six month period. The lucky race to host the GG's will reap the financial rewards. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](15% Economic bonus to the chosen race)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GalacticGamesFund_Question
StringTable.String: Who should host the Galactic Games?

StringTable.Label: CulturalPreservationCouncil_Name
StringTable.String: Cultural Preservation Council

StringTable.Label: CulturalPreservationCouncil_Dec
StringTable.String: In an attempt to lower tension between member nations, the U.P. moves that colonies will no longer be able to change their allegiance. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Colonies controlled by members can no longer have Influence affected)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: CulturalPreservationCouncil_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have a Cultural Preservation Council?

StringTable.Label: InterstellarPatentBoard_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Patent Board

StringTable.Label: InterstellarPatentBoard_Dec
StringTable.String: In order to stimulate research, the United Planets endorses the formation of an Interstellar Patent Board. That will allow inventing races to make a profit as a reward for their efforts. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](The first member to research a tech gets 25% of its cost back in credits)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: InterstellarPatentBoard_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have an Interstellar Patent Board?

StringTable.Label: FreedomOfTechnologyAct_Name
StringTable.String: Freedom of Technology

StringTable.Label: FreedomOfTechnologyAct_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets, in an attempt to equalize opportunity, will require all of its members to provide one tech to be shared with all members. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](A random tech will be chosen from each member, and given to all others)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: FreedomOfTechnologyAct_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have a Freedom of Technology Act?

StringTable.Label: UnitedPlanetsResearchFoundation_Name
StringTable.String: U.P. Research Foundation

StringTable.Label: UnitedPlanetsResearchFoundation_Dec
StringTable.String: In order to foster growth and quality of life, the United Planets moves to fund a Research Foundation that will facilitate the sharing of Knowledge throughout the galaxy. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Non-military technologies will be 25% cheaper to research for members)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: UnitedPlanetsResearchFoundation_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have an United Planets Research Foundation?

StringTable.Label: TechnologyExploitationPreventionAct_Name
StringTable.String: Tech. Exploitation Prevention

StringTable.Label: TechnologyExploitationPreventionAct_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets has found that technology trading races have taken advantage of unwary races, brokering these technologies to their enemies. Therefore, it proposes a ban on all technology brokering. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Technologies may not be resold to other races)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: TechnologyExploitationPreventionAct_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have a Technology Exploitation Prevention Act?

StringTable.Label: TechnologyNonInterferenceAct_Name
StringTable.String: Technical Non-Interference

StringTable.Label: TechnologyNonInterferenceAct_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets has become concerned that the ramped up trading of technology has begun to stifle the cultural development of its members, encouraging homogenization over cultural diversity. It therefore proposes a ban on all technological trading. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Disables technology trading)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: TechnologyNonInterferenceAct_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have a Technology Non-Interference Act?

StringTable.Label: EnvironmentalProtectionAct_Name
StringTable.String: Environmental Protection

StringTable.Label: EnvironmentalProtectionAct_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets, in an attempt to protect what is left of the virgin worlds in the galaxy, calls for a freeze to all colonization. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Members can not colonize new planets)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: EnvironmentalProtectionAct_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have an Environmental Protection Act?

StringTable.Label: DemilitarizationTreaty_Name
StringTable.String: Demilitarization

StringTable.Label: DemilitarizationTreaty_Dec
StringTable.String: In order to foster peace in the galaxy, the United Planets moves to ban the research of all new weapons technologies for a limited duration. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Un-researched weapons techs are locked for the duration)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DemilitarizationTreaty_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have a Demilitarization Treaty?

StringTable.Label: InterstellarTradeStimulusAct_Name
StringTable.String: Interstellar Trade Stimulus

StringTable.Label: InterstellarTradeStimulusAct_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets believes that thriving interstellar peace is good for all its members, promoting good will and economic growth. To this end it is endorsing the expansion of trade licences, granting each race an additional two trade routes each. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Members gain two additional trade routes)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: InterstellarTradeStimulusAct_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have an Interstellar Trade Stimulus Act?

StringTable.Label: DiversityInTradeAct_Name
StringTable.String: Diversity in Trade

StringTable.Label: DiversityInTradeAct_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets feels that exclusive trading causes cultural islands that breed strife in the galaxy. In order to encourage diversification, the UP proposes an economic reward to races that trade with all members that they are not at war with. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Having at least one trade route with each member provides a 50% bonus to Trade income)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DiversityInTradeAct_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have a Diversity in Trade Act?

StringTable.Label: GalacticDomainAct_Name
StringTable.String: Galactic Domain

StringTable.Label: GalacticDomainAct_Dec
StringTable.String: The United Planets feels that uncolonized planets in an empire's borders belong to that empire. The UP proposes a resolution to block other races from colonizing them. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](Players can not colonize planets in another player's borders)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: GalacticDomainAct_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have a Galactic Domain Act?

StringTable.Label: DefiantRaceRemoval_Name
StringTable.String: Defiant Race Removal

StringTable.Label: DefiantRaceRemoval_Dec
StringTable.String: Any faction in the UP must forever vow to purge the galaxy of any faction defying the UP. [COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight](All members declare war on anyone who is defying the UP)[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: DefiantRaceRemoval_Question
StringTable.String: Should we have a Defiant Race Removal Act?
